Package org.educraft.entity

Provides the classes necessary to create the different custom mobs used in the mod.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    INumberMob
    Interface defining anything that can drop a number.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    NumberMobDropsEvent
    Event handler class providing a single method to control the dropping of items by entities.
    NumberSkeleton
    Customised skeleton that drops a multiple of ten between 10 and 100 upon death, instead of its normal drops.
    NumberZombie
    Customised zombie that drops a number between 1 and 10 upon death, in place of its normal drops.

Package org.educraft.entity Description

Provides the classes necessary to create the different custom mobs used in the mod.
